title: The Snowy owls of Shetland
creator_credit: Anthony Clay and Royal Society for the Protection of Birds
brief_description: The first breeding record for the snowy owls in Britain is recorded at Fetlar, in the Shetland Isles off the coast of Scotland. This film is a record of the birds whilst being guarded by the members of the Royal Society for the Protection of Birds.
creator_credit_for_label: Anthony Clay and Royal Society for the Protection of Birds
